data.name: Agatha Knife - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Agatha Knife original soundtrack by GUVISE (Guillem Vilamala Serrano) and Mango Protocol features all the score from the game.

All files are in MP3 format and will be downloaded in your Agatha Knife folder in the Steam library (...\steamapps\common\Agatha Knife\soundtrack).

1. Believe in Carnivorism (1:22)
2. Agatha Knife (1:27)
3. Sad insomniac (0:53)
4. Time traveling cheese (0:53)
5. Weird people (1:22)
6. Religion workshop (1:36)
7. Rotten meat (0:54)
8. Awesome Sandro (0:59)
9. Dormant Imaginarium (0:57)
10. Interstellar Wars (0:47)
11. Yellow socks and piggy t-shirt (1:28)
12. Tea party (0:46)
13. Drunken genius (1:15)
14. Spicy Doggy Burger (1:00)
15. Progressive Doggy Burger (1:04)
16. Expensive treatment (0:59)
17. Please STFU (1:32)
18. Tiny riot (1:01)
19. Antelope meatballs (0:48)
20. Waiting for the meat truck (1:33)
21. Great Bleeding Pig (1:55)
22. The Prophetess of Carnivorism (1:35)
